}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Models=== WUBR-507N is designed with multiple product SKUs to fit is all platforms. :Here are all the skus for this USB module:
:;SKU Part Name - Specification *WUBR-507N(M) - 6-Pin & U.FL Connector *WUBR-507N(MU) - USB Type A & U.FL Connector *WUBR-507N(P) - USB Type A & Printed Antenna ([https://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan387/ EW]) *WUBR-507N(P6) - 6-Pin & Printed Antenna
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow" mode="slideshow"> File:SparkLAN WUBR-507N(M) Top.jpeg|Board top File:SparkLAN WUBR-507N(M) Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== :;[[SparkLAN]] • [[List of SparkLAN Wireless Devices]] *[[SparkLAN WUBR-505N]] - 802.11a/b/g/n USB Module • [[Ralink]] RT2870/RT2850 *[[SparkLAN WUBR-506N]] - 802.11a/b/g/n USB Module • [[Ralink]] RT2870/RT2850 *[[SparkLAN WUBR-507N]] - 802.11a/b/g/n USB Module • [[Ralink]] RT3572 ([https://www.wireless-driver.com/sparklan-wubr-508n-usb-module-drivers-software/ WD]) *[[SparkLAN WUBR-508N]] - 802.11a/b/g/n USB Module • [[Ralink]] RT5572 ([https://www.wireless-driver.com/sparklan-wubr-507n-usb-module-drivers-software/ WD])
